entries.title: The 5 best e-readers of 2023
entries.description: The best e-readers let you carry an entire library everywhere you go. Our favorites have adjustable displays and page-turning buttons for an easy-to-read experience.

entries.title: How to make folders on an iPhone
entries.description: Grouping your apps in folders makes them easier to find, and it's a step toward cleaning up your iPhone's home screen.

entries.title: What is Opera's My Flow feature and how do you use it?
entries.description: If Opera is your default browser, there's a feature available that will greatly simplify your life as you move from device to device.

entries.title: How to clear the cache on your iPhone (and why you should)
entries.description: Cache and cookies can clog your browser and slow down your iPhone's performance. Here's what you need to know.

entries.title: The 5 best Bluetooth speakers of 2023
entries.description: Bluetooth speakers let you listen to your favorite music anywhere. And with water-resistant speakers, you can jam out poolside or at the beach without worrying about damage.

entries.title: The 5 best mini projectors of 2023
entries.description: Portability is a huge plus when it comes to entertainment. The best mini projectors are Wi-Fi compatible, easy to use, and most importantly, can be taken anywhere.

entries.title: The 5 best cheap phones of 2023
entries.description: Flagship phones come with unique features, but they can also be expensive. The best cheap phones give you access to the features you need at a better price.

entries.title: The Balolo Tripod Stand takes Apple's HomePod Mini to the next level. Literally
entries.description: The HomePod Mini doesn't need something to make it look better, but this accessory does make it look cool.

entries.title: No one wants to buy a PC right now - and prices are falling
entries.description: In Q4 of 2022, Worldwide PC shipments fell to their lowest numbers in years, according to Gartner and IDC

entries.title: How to loan a Kindle book
entries.description: Author Donalyn Miller said, "You are not done with a book until you pass it to another reader." Here's how to share your e-books with family and friends.

entries.title: Standard Notes might be the best note-taking app on the market
entries.description: If you're looking for a note-taking app that can sync across devices, don't overlook the open-source Standard Notes.

entries.title: Get this Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 for $850 today only
entries.description: Quality laptop for a quality price. Score this Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 for $150 off at Best Buy today only.

entries.title: How to hide apps on your iPhone fast
entries.description: Ever want to remove an app from your iPhone's home screen but still hang onto it just in case you need it again? It's incredibly easy to do but maybe people still don't know how.

entries.title: YouTube Short creators win big with these new updates
entries.description: YouTube adds new features to enhance short-form video sharing on its app.

entries.title: Apple's newest M2 MacBook Air is on sale for under $1,000

entries.title: How to recycle your old electronics into Amazon gift cards

entries.title: UWB: What it is and why you really need an iPhone to use it
entries.description: UWB is hot technology, but support for it in Android devices is frustratingly meager.

entries.title: Microsoft is going to give workers unlimited time off
entries.description: Microsoft joins the growing number of companies to stop requiring employees to log their paid time off. But is it good or bad for employees?

entries.title: Sony has a new Walkman. That might be a bigger deal than you realize
entries.description: Who needs a Walkman when you've got a smartphone already? Perhaps you're asking the wrong question.

entries.title: He coined the term 'metaverse.' Now, Neal Stephenson wants to make something of it
entries.description: The 'Snowcrash' author was at CES to advocate an open metaverse; he spoke with ZDNET Editor in Chief Jason Hiner about how his startup Lamina1 will lay the foundation for it.

entries.title: How to track an AirTag
entries.description: The Apple AirTag is an effective tracking tool small enough to attach to most frequently lost items. Learn how to track an AirTag using Find My.

entries.description: In a major turnaround, Apple is reportedly seriously considering making a MacBook Pro with a touchscreen.

entries.title: US flight delays: Here's what caused the FAA's plane-grounding system outage

entries.title: Samsung launches PCIe 4.0 SSD with 5nm controller for PCs
entries.description: The PCIe 4.0 SSD has sequential read and write speeds of 6,000MB/s and 5,600MB/s, respectively.

entries.title: Singapore firms need open, integrated tools in hybrid work
entries.description: Shift towards hybrid work introduces challenges Singapore businesses need to address to facilitate meaningful employee experience and ensure tools can continue to drive productivity.
